citations.narrative:
The facility last reviewed and revised the contingency plan on 7/24/22. In 2023, the IACUC reviewed the contingency
plan, but the changes had not been added to the plan at the time of inspection. Updates to the contingency plan should
be documented in the plan in a timely matter. The facility must document the changes to the contingency plan, in
accordance with the regulations, to ensure animals are humanely handled during an emergency or disaster. Correct by
August 30, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility last reviewed and revised the contingency plan on 7/24/22. In 2023, the IACUC reviewed the contingency 
plan, but the changes had not been added to the plan at the time of inspection. Updates to the contingency plan should 
be documented in the plan in a timely matter. The facility must document the changes to the contingency plan, in 
accordance with the regulations, to ensure animals are humanely handled during an emergency or disaster. Correct by 
August 30, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
